{{Remarks_Section
|Remarks=In the following example, the string object is the same as the return value.

 var str = "every good boy does fine";
 var strStr = str.valueOf();
 
 if (str === strStr)
 document.write("same");
 else
 document.write("different");
 
 // Output:
 // same
